title: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 4: Why did captaincy task leave Kishwer in tears?
text: Recapping the night’s episode, the ' Bigg Boss 9' house inmates are trying to find some relief from Arvind and Vikas’s snores by sleeping next to them in turns. During this conversation, Mandana is adamant that she will not move her bed regardless of who is snoring and who is not. Adding that she is not a part of this ... »
